sent.orig: Energize is formed from energy by analogy with apologize from aplogy.
sent.trans: Energize由energy 演变构成，以此类推，apologize 则由apology演变构成。

sent.orig: Accent the word "energy" on the first syllable.
Energize is formed from energy the same way that apologize is formed from apology.
sent.trans: Energize由energy演变构成，以此类推，apologize则由apology演变构成。

sent.orig: Renewable energy includes energy, energy, energy, bio-energy, geothermal energy and energy.
sent.trans: 可再生能源主要包括太阳能、风能、水能、生物质能、地热能和海洋能等。

sent.orig: We buy energy, sell energy, eat energy, waste energy about conserving energy, and fight over energy.
sent.trans: 我们买能源、出售能源，吃能源、浪费能源、储存能源，更为能源而战。
